entry.data:
CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN AND SNOW LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW IN THE EVENING
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS 15 TO 20

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
